templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content:
Sorry for the inconvenience! Once an order has been placed, we're unable to cancel or modify it.

Regarding shipping address updates, we can't guarantee changes after an order has been processed. However, you're welcome to contact our team through the following link, and they'll be happy to look into this for you: https://www.fashionnova.com/pages/contact-us

templates.name: Do you offer free returns?
templates.content: Unfortunately, we do not offer free returns. You can return in-store or purchase a return label from our website: https://www.fashionnova.com/pages/help-center?hcUrl=%2Fen-US%2Four-return-policy-and-process-637538

templates.name: Damaged/broken item
templates.content:
I'm really sorry for the inconvenience. Please do not send the damaged items through the return portal. Instead, contact Customer Care through our Fashion Nova Help Center: https://www.fashionnova.com/pages/help-center We will verify the issue, send a complimentary label if needed, and refund the item to your original payment method. Please note that 
if your order was delivered over 14 days ago, regrettably, we cannot help you with damage reported outside this time frame.

templates.name: Discount/Promo
templates.content: We do not allow stacking of discount codes, it only applies one discount code per order.

templates.name: Why did I receive a partial refund after placing my order?
templates.content: One or more of your items may have sold out since your order was processed.

templates.name: My order was returned to sender or refused
templates.content: Returned to sender or refused packages will be restocked and you will be issued store credit in the form of a gift card minus the initial shipping charge. Check out this link for more information: https://www.fashionnova.com/pages/help-center?hcUrl=%2Fen-US%2Fmy-order-was-returned-to-sender-or-refused-637539

templates.name: What happens if I use a gift card to pay for all or part of my order and some items were out of stock?
templates.content: The amount refunded will go back to the gift card that was used, any remaining balance will be returned to your other form of payment.

templates.name: Can I track my return?
templates.content: Once you have purchased a return shipping label through our Online Returns Portal and mailed your package, you can easily track your shipment through our returns tracking page: https://fashionnova.shipment.co/track

templates.name: Do gift cards expire?
templates.content:
Fashion Nova gift cards never expire and can be treated just like cash on our online store! 

Keep in mind, Fashion Nova may issue a non-purchasable special promotional e-card. These cards will have an expiration date. In this case, you will be made aware of this expiration date upon issuance.

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: A salute to your service! No special discounts, but our site is always bursting with promotions to fuel your fashion spree.

templates.name: Care Instructions
templates.content: Each FN item you order will have different care instruction on the tag.

templates.name: Sizing (shoes)
templates.content: Our shoes generally run true-to-size, but our customer reviews offer fun fit tips for extra confidence!

templates.name: Do you have printed catalogs?
templates.content: We're eco-friendly! For the latest FN buzz, follow us on social media and subscribe to our emails.

templates.name: Products too expensive / price complaints
templates.content: Adjusting filters could help! Sort by price and narrow down by category and size for a smoother shopping experience.

templates.name: Unsubscribe Email
templates.content: Scroll to the bottom of our latest email and tap the "Preference Center" link. There, you can adjust frequency or scroll down and hit unsubscribe. Happy email management!

templates.name: Do you have a store on Amazon?
templates.content: We're not on Amazon, but we accept Amazon Pay! Shop directly on our site for the ultimate FN experience.

templates.name: Do you have petite sizes?
templates.content: Petite Nova Stars, we've got you! The inseam measurement in our product descriptions will help you find your perfect fit.

templates.name: How can I leave a review?
templates.content: Look out for our review-request email! And remember, you can rave about your FN favs on our site anytime!

templates.name: Which style do I own?
templates.content: Could you please provide us a few pictures of the item so we can try locating the style?

templates.name: Basic Support
templates.content: I can answer some basic questions over text, if I can't help you out I would be more than happy to redirect you to our advance team at Customer Care.

templates.name: Latest Trends?
templates.content: Check out all our Instagram pages for the latest trends for Womens, Mens, Kids, Curve, and Beauty.

templates.name: What sizes do you carry?
templates.content: FN's speciality is in our variety, with clothing size ranging from XS to 3X.

templates.name: Where do you ship from?
templates.content: We ship out FN packages straight from our Distribution Center located in Southern California!

templates.name: Payments Methods
templates.content: Great question! We accept A LOT of payment methods, this page has all the methods we accept: https://fashionnova-nyxrps4z2n0.gorgias.help/en-US/accepted-payment-methods-637551

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Check out our pages our Instagram, Facebook, Twitter all the sites end with /FashionNova

templates.name: Where are you located?
templates.content: We're sprinkled all over SoCal with our trendy stores and offices.

templates.name: Unavailable Territories, are there areas we don't deliver to
templates.content: We ship worldwide! If we can't deliver to your location at checkout, check back later-things can change due to global events.

templates.name: Do you ship to APO/FPO, or PO Boxes?
templates.content: We've got you covered! We ship to PO Boxes and APO addresses. Please note that shipping times may vary based on location and carrier. See more about our shipping policies here: https://www.fashionnova.com/pages/shipping-policy

templates.name: Rewards / referral
templates.content: We do not currently have a referral or rewards program but subscribe to our emails for first dibs on hot deals!

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: We do not currently offer phone support at this time, but you can always reach out to us at https://www.fashionnova.com/pages/contact-us

templates.name: Do you have an app I can download?
templates.content: Yes, we do! You can download our app here: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/fashion-nova/id1367363988 for iOS or here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=co.tapcart.app.npQt0DXZpj for Android.

templates.name: Can I get a refund or exchange for my gift card?
templates.content: I'm afraid gift cards are final sale items, therefore, they can't be returned for a refund or exchanged unless required by law. I really appreciate your patience and understanding on this!

templates.name: I was asked to pay for a collaboration
templates.content: Sorry to hear that! We never request any form of payment to enter a collaboration. Additionally, all email communication from us will always end with "@fashionnova.com" or "@novabeauty.com"

templates.name: Size Guide
templates.content: Our clothes usually run true to size, but we have a size guide here to help find your best fit: https://www.fashionnova.com/pages/size-guide

templates.name: Model / Influencer / Talent / Brand ambassador / sponsorship / affiliate program
templates.content: Excited to have you on board! Apply at https://babe.nova-influencer.com/collab Good luck, NovaStar!

templates.name: Return policy / Warranty Policy
templates.content: Visit https://www.fashionnova.com/pages/help-center?hcUrl=%2Fen-US%2Four-return-policy-and-process-637538 for the latest info. If you're not feeling your item(s), you have 30 days from delivery to return.

templates.name: Do you have international shipping?
templates.content: We do have international shipping! Check out this page for shipping prices: https://www.fashionnova.com/pages/shipping-options

templates.name: Login Issues
templates.content: No worries! To fix login issues, reset your Fashion Nova password. Visit the sign-in page, click "Forgot your Password?", and follow the email instructions to reset. Easy fix!

templates.name: Do you offer any financing?
templates.content: Yes, we offer ZIP, Afterpay, and Klarna. You can find out more about it here: https://www.fashionnova.com/pages/zip-and-afterpay-faq

templates.name: Do yo have jobs available?
templates.content: We'd love for you to join our FN family! Visit https://www.fashionnova.com/pages/careers#jobs to see our open positions.

templates.name: Where's my gift card?
templates.content: Gift cards are delivered by email along with the instructions on how to redeem them. Have you checked your spam and promo folders as sometimes our emails end up there?

templates.name: When do you release new drops/products?
templates.content: We are always dropping new items, check our new arrivals page frequently here: https://www.fashionnova.com/collections/new

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: Yes we have retail locations located in Southern California, check them out here: https://www.fashionnova.com/pages/locations

templates.name: Order status/order tracking
templates.content: You can track your order at https://www.fashionnova.com/pages/track-order

templates.name: Are your promos online only?
templates.content: Our sales in store may vary from the website, but you can call to ask for their deals! Locations and numbers are here: https://www.fashionnova.com/pages/locations

templates.name: Sizing (clothes)
templates.content: We are here to help you find the perfect outfit! Visit https://www.fashionnova.com/pages/size-guide to view our size guides for "Women", "Men", and "Kids".

templates.name: Can I return an online purchase in store?
templates.content: You may return qualified items in-store, check out our https://www.fashionnova.com/pages/help-center?hcUrl=%2Fen-US%2Four-return-policy-and-process-637538 as there are some restrictions.

templates.name: Can I use store credit at one of your locations?
templates.content: Yes! You can use our store credit online or in-store and the best part is that it never expires!

templates.name: When will you restock?
templates.content: I'm sorry, I currently don't have the exact date of a possible restock. If you want a restock alert, click the out-of-stock item size to be pinged when it's back in stock!

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We offer free shipping if an order is over a certain amount, check out more information here: https://www.fashionnova.com/pages/help-center?hcUrl=%2Fen-US%2Fshipping-options-prices-and-times-637543

templates.name: Where are your clothes manufactured?
templates.content: Global fashion? We've got it! We source from vendors worldwide to keep you in vogue.

templates.name: Do you offer gift wrapping or gift messages?
templates.content: Gift cards are your best bet for presents-we don't offer gift wrap or messages, and orders include an invoice.

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: We don't offer wholesale discounts, but our FN site is actively updated with promotions and deals.

templates.name: Discount/Promo (Expired)
templates.content: Oh no! Sorry you couldn't use the discount code. Unfortunately, that specific code is expired, subscribe to our email or text promotions to be updated right away.

templates.name: Support
templates.content: Thanks for reaching out! This question will be best handled by visiting https://www.fashionnova.com/pages/contact-us and beginning an inquiry with our team!

templates.name: Final Sale
templates.content: All items ending in $.48 and .98, bodysuits, swimwear, undergarments, beauty products, cosmetics, accessories, and "Party Wear" (such as Halloween costumes) are considered final sale, non-returnable and cannot be returned for store credit.

templates.name: Exchange Items
templates.content: We do not offer exchanges but we welcome you to return your item(s) by mail in accordance with our Return Policy by using our online returns portal and repurchasing any available item(s) on our site.

templates.name: What's the difference in shipping between UPS Saturday and 2 Business Days?
templates.content: 2 Business Days shipping means your order should be delivered within 2 business days once shipped but excludes weekends. UPS Saturday allows customers to receive packages on Saturdays.

templates.name: Can I purchase a return shipping label?
templates.content:
Yes! Fashion Nova offers return shipping labels for US customers. Using return shipping labels is the recommended way to return your item to Fashion Nova, as you will be able to track your return and receive your credit much more quickly than if you were to send your return back yourself.

Return shipping labels can be purchased for $3.99 if you are returning a single item or for $7.99 if you are returning multiple items. Return shipping labels can be purchased and all returns can be submitted in our Returns Portal: https://returns.fashionnova.com/fashionnova/returns

templates.name: How will I receive my refund for my return/exchange?
templates.content: Please note that we do not provide cash refunds. Returns are refunded via store credit in the form of a Fashion Nova gift card. Returns are processed within 5-7 business days after your item(s) are delivered to us. To receive your store credit more quickly, use the pre-paid return label option in our Returns Portal: https://returns.fashionnova.com/fashionnova/returns

templates.name: Can I get a free gift card for my birthday?
templates.content: Happy birthday! I'm afraid we don't have a specific offer like that but our deals will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out! In the meantime, you can check out our sales collection here: https://www.fashionnova.com/collections/sale

templates.name: When will I receive my refund? (Canceled orders)
templates.content: Fashion Nova will take 2-5 business days to clear your refund. Depending on your financial institution, the refund amount may take up to 10 business days to post to your account. If you used a gift card to purchase your item(s), your funds will be issued back to your gift card immediately.

templates.name: Why was my order canceled?
templates.content: Sorry about that! It's possible that your item sold out after the order was processed.

templates.name: Does my credit automatically apply to my order?
templates.content: You will have to manually enter the gift card code at checkout. The instructions to redeem them should be sent to your email.

templates.name: How do I redeem my gift card?
templates.content: If you received the gift card code in your email, please make sure you enter the 16-digit code at checkout, not in your cart. Your gift card can also be applied with our promo codes. Let me know how it goes!

templates.name: Can I apply a discount code/promo to purchase a gift card?
templates.content: I'm afraid promotional discounts, coupons, or offers can't be applied to the purchase of a gift card.

templates.name: Sales Collection
templates.content: You can take a look at our sales collection here: https://www.fashionnova.com/collections/sale

templates.name: How can I resend my gift card?
templates.content: To resend a gift card to the email associated with your account, login to your Fashion Nova account and click on "Gift Cards" from the left-hand menu. Click "Resend to Email" on any of your active gift cards to receive an email with the gift card number.

templates.name: Do you have expedited/rush/express shipping?
templates.content:
Yes, we have 1 Business Day and 2 Business Days shipping options. For the estimated timeframe to be honored, you need to order by 3 pm ET. 

Please note that if you place your order after 3 pm ET, the processing and shipping timeline shifts-your shipment will be processed as if it was placed the next business day, so your delivery estimate will be delayed by at least one business day.

We also offer UPS Saturday Delivery.

templates.name: Can I return an item if the tag came off?
templates.content:
Please note that all returned items must meet all of the following requirements:

• They are unworn.
• They are unwashed.
• They have all original tags attached.

Let me know if you have any more questions or need help with anything else; I'm here!

templates.name: Can I return items from multiple orders in the same package?
templates.content: Yes! If you're in the United States, you can return items from multiple orders in a single package, if you follow the correct steps in the return portal. Make sure you have the order numbers for all items you want to return handy. Navigate to the returns portal and enter one of the order numbers with your email. On the next screen, click "Check eligibility" at the bottom of the screen and enter an additional order number. Repeat this process for each order with an item you'd like to return with the same label. Once you've entered all the order numbers, select all the items you want to return and click "Next.".

templates.name: Gift Card Balance
templates.content: You can check your E-Gift Card balance here https://www.fashionnova.com/pages/gift-card-balance

templates.name: Can discount codes be added retroactively?
templates.content: Unfortunately, codes can't be retroactively applied once an order is placed. Sorry for the inconvenience!

templates.name: Refunds (Canceled orders)
templates.content:
Fashion Nova issues refunds to the original form of payment used on an order in the event that your order:
is canceled by Fashion Nova, one or more of your items sold out since your order was processed, or item(s) proved to be received damaged, defective, or incorrect. You can learn more here: https://www.fashionnova.com/pages/refunds-faq

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content:
Our processing time takes up to 4 business days for standard orders, up to 3 business days for expedited orders, and up to 1 business day for rush orders. Please note that during holiday periods and certain promotional events, you can expect an additional 7-10 days of processing time. You can view our full shipping timeframes here: https://www.fashionnova.com/pages/help-center?hcUrl=%2Fen-US%2Fshipping-options-prices-and-times-637543
, or reach out to our Customer Care team for more detailed assistance.

templates.name: Support 2
templates.content:
I'm sorry for the inconvenience! Please submit your inquiry via this link instead: https://www.fashionnova.com/pages/help-center?hcUrl=%2Fen-US%2Fflows%2F01J6WCRVQ0NTMTCP19DN3GJ28C On the first page, select "Something Else", then select "Something Else" again.

On the page that asks, "Do you have access to the email or phone number associated with your account?", select "No." On the following page, select "Something Else" even if another option seems to match your issue.

On the following page, even if your issue appears in the list, you need to select "No." This will bring you to the section where you can type your inquiry and provide all necessary details to help resolve the issue.

templates.name: Will I be notified when my return is received or processed?
templates.content: We don't send notifications when your return is received or processed. For U.S. returns using our prepaid label or QR code, you can track your return status through the Returns Portal here: https://returns.fashionnova.com/fashionnova/returns. You'll receive an email once your gift card credit has been issued for the return.

templates.name: Can I edit or change my prepaid return label?
templates.content: Labels can not be edited once purchased, please purchase another label or start a new return for additional items. And keep in mind, once a label or QR code is selected, it cannot be switched to the other format. If you need a different format, please create a new return.

templates.name: How long do I have to drop off my package when returning?
templates.content: Your label will remain valid for a limited time. We recommend using it as soon as possible to avoid delays in processing your return.

templates.name: Why is there a prepaid label fee?
templates.content: The fee covers the cost of shipping at a heavily discounted UPS rate for shipping and processing.

templates.name: How to initiate a return?
templates.content: You can start your return here: https://returns.fashionnova.com/fashionnova/returns. When returning an item, you can either ship it yourself using a prepaid shipping label or drop off the return at UPS using a shipping QR code. For more information, please check out the link here: https://fashionnova-nyxrps4z2n0.gorgias.help/en-US/how-to-make-a-return-1638422?isEmbedded=true

templates.name: Return to sender/refused order, refund timeframe
templates.content: When the RTS or refused parcel is scanned at our warehouse, a E-Gift Card for the full order amount (minus the initial shipping fee) will be issued within 10 business days. Sealed RTS boxes often process sooner.

templates.name: Shipping for oversize orders $499.99+
templates.content: Please note that Fashion Nova defines orders over $499.99 (before shipping and taxes, but after discount) as oversize orders. Oversize orders are excluded from any and all shipping-related promotional offers (e.g., Free 1-Day Shipping, Free Standard Shipping on orders over $75). Oversize orders are subject to the shipping rates listed here: https://www.fashionnova.com/pages/help-center?hcUrl=%2Fen-US%2Foversize-orders-1181529

templates.name: Store credit amount for returning BOGO item
templates.content:
When you return items purchased through a Buy One, Get One Free or Buy One, Get One X% Off promotion, your store credit will be adjusted based on the promotional pricing:

• If you're returning both items, you'll receive store credit for the full amount you paid.
• If you're returning only one item, your credit will be adjusted based on the value of the free item.
